content: **from the website ** beautiful crochet afghan pattern is fun to stitch and makes a great project for your own home or the perfect gift for someone special skill level intermediate supplies red heart® super saver® 14 ounces no 316 soft white ca 22 ounces no 939 sugar & spice cb 19 ounces no 633 dark sage cc gauge 7 cluster = 5 strip = 6½ across available in english and french on yarn wrapper
